h2_title: Buddha's Right Hand Boss Fight and Guide
content: Doing so will often cause the hand to become immobile for a few moments, so be ready to turn around and chase it to follow up some a few attacks.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Buddha's_Right_Hand.md', within the main section titled 'Buddha's Right Hand', specifically from the subsection 'Buddha's Right Hand Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
Doing so will often cause the hand to become immobile for a few moments, so be ready to turn around and chase it to follow up some a few attacks.
